# pingone_risk_predictors (Data Source)

Datasource to retrieve the IDs of multiple PingOne Risk Predictors.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "pingone_risk_predictors" "example" {
  environment_id = var.environment_id
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `environment_id` (String) The ID of the environment to retrieve the risk predictors from.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `ids` (List of String) The list of resulting IDs of risk predictors that have been successfully retrieved.
